00054 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00055     CastHandler
00056     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00059 template<class DestHandler> inline void CastHandler(DestHandler &p_handler_to, const BaseHandler *p_handler_from)
00060 {
00061     ASSERT (p_handler_from != 0);
00062 
00063     // reset destination handler
00064     p_handler_to = 0;
00065 
00066     ASSERT(p_handler_from->GetHandlerId() == DestHandler()->ID);
00067     p_handler_to = (DestHandler) p_handler_from;
00068 }// CastHandler
